text.0: In patients with sickle cell disease, the genetic silencing of BCL11A resulted in increased expression of fetal hemoglobin and a decline in the frequency of sickle cell crises. #ASH20
text.1: Two patients, one with transfusion-dependent β-thalassemia and one with sickle cell disease, received autologous CD34+ cells edited with CRISPR-Cas9 targeting of BCL11A. Their clinical course supports further experimental testing of gene editing to treat these diseases. #ASH20
text.2:
Covid-19 Rx: Your task is to gather data, develop a differential diagnosis, order additional diagnostic tests, and treat the patient. (Optimized for desktop PCs and most tablets.) 
@NEJMGroup #COVID19
